p: The spleen, heart, liver, lung, kidney, white adipose tissue deposits (mesenteric, retroperitoneal, epididymal and inguinal subcutaneous), and skeletal muscles (extensor digitorum longus and soleus) were collected and weighed to determine the relative mass, calculated as the ratio of the mass of tissue per organ and per body weight of the animal. The liver fragments were dehydrated for lipid quantification.
